text: Helloo, is there a way to apply css changes to published pages? We published website pages, but needs to apply mobile design to them. Looks like they are not uploaded automatically. I'd be appreciate for any help :pray:
If you can verify in the Design Manager that they’re uploading, you might need to install the HubSpot developer extension for Chrome and bust the cache.
CSS is cached pretty heavily sometimes.
if they’re not uploading, you’ll need to check your watch and upload process locally
Hi <@UQERM7BLY>! Did you publish the script? :pray:

Hi all, I'm relatively new here so please forgive me if this isn't the right place to ask but as soon as I duplicate a page on the default theme, and I make a change the watch command gives me an error:
`[ERROR] Error validating template.`
`[ERROR] line 0: Template does not include the tag {{ standard_header_includes }}.`
`[ERROR] line 0: Template does not include the tag {{ standard_footer_includes }}. Needed for HubSpot analytics`

I'm not sure what is causing it and even if I revert the changes the error doesn't disappear. Any ideas? Thank you in advance.
